title: When you totally fail your combo, but somehow get the kill anyway

replies.body:
Just 

As 

Planned
lol this is Leblanc when she is overtuned
Also known as playing Zed or Yasuo.

First thought i had from this title was zed.

W R E *cancels aa* *ignites* misses all 3 Q's *electrocute* *enemy slain*
That doesn’t proc electrocute tho.

> [{quoted}](name=Andevar,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3ElzA2Gl,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-03-09T18:45:19.270+0000)
>
> That doesn’t proc electrocute tho.

fine - electrocute still enemy slain :/
That’s impossible unless you’re 50 HP, which is your fault for staying in lane with 50HP

> [{quoted}](name=Andevar,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3ElzA2Gl,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2019-03-09T21:08:21.796+0000)
>
> That’s impossible unless you’re 50 HP, which is your fault for staying in lane with 50HP

-_- i guess you are new to the game and havent seen what zed can do. + its a meme you dip
It’s a meme that doesn’t make sense. If he hit his auto then maybe, but he didn’t. So no Duskblade proc, only E and ignite. ?????
Coming soon to a Tony Hawk game!

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3ElzA2Gl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-03-08T00:26:38.224+0000)
>
> Coming soon to a Tony Hawk game!

I could go for an old-fashioned Tony Hawk game on the Switch.
(Metroid Prime Trilogy HD when?)

> [{quoted}](name=Glaricion,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3ElzA2Gl,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-03-08T01:29:28.388+0000)
>
> I could go for an old-fashioned Tony Hawk game on the Switch.
> (Metroid Prime Trilogy HD when?)

Oh hell yeah, I loved Tony Hawk games back in the day.

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3ElzA2Gl,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2019-03-08T20:16:27.612+0000)
>
> Oh hell yeah, I loved Tony Hawk games back in the day.

There was one level where I grinded (ground?) around the entire map like 3 times to set the record for longest grind, it was like 2 minutes or something. My brother could never get even close even though he was better at the game in all other ways.

Pretty sure Lee Sin players experience this a lot.

Hence, the term Lee Sindrome where they think they should get the kill anyway but then don't.
... somehow?  This is post pre-season 8.  You don't need to do any combos.

"When you totally fail your combo, but somehow get the kill anyway"

then you play zed.
**support high fiving you at the end**
LMAO ME
God I miss skateboarding.
Calculated.
....For real tho, that was amazing {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Plus when at the end of the fight your teammate writes “nice job” in chat.
